title: Sec4rets
description: We all have secrets... High school can be a tough time for some but for four best friends it's extremely difficult. Mark, Tiffany, Kim and Kevin find out that high school is not fun and games. They must stick together to get through it but, when secrets start to come out things start to go down hill. So will they get through it and still remain best friends or will the secrets be enough to tear them apart? Let the secrets come out...
author: A.L. Burgos
